PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-17172009-10-08,  CAN POST,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Letter Mail Regulations
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE LETTER MAIL REGULATIONS, will establish the rates of postage for domestic letter mail items other than the basic domestic letter rate, effective January 11, 2010. These amendments will ensure that postal costs remain transparent and predictable for Canadians and Canadian businesses and will provide Canada Post with the financial means it needs to meet its service obligations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0287 Publication Date: 2009-10-28
